name: Powershell WMI Persistence
description: Adversaries may establish persistence and elevate privileges by executing malicious content triggered by a Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) event subscription.
query: ((powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Cc][Ii][Mm][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]\ [Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\/[Ss][Uu][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss][Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ __[Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ff][Ii][Ll][Tt][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Yy]\ .*/) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Cc][Ii][Mm][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]\ [Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\/[Ss][Uu][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss][Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ii][Nn][Ee][Ee][Vv][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ss][Uu][Mm][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Pp][Rr][Oo][Pp][Ee][Rr][Tt][Yy]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-CimInstance\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Namespace\ root\/subscription\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ClassName\ __EventFilter\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Property\ *) OR (powershell.file.script_block_text:*New\-CimInstance\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Namespace\ root\/subscription\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-ClassName\ CommandLineEventConsumer\ * AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-Property\ *))`
